mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adoption (oid, nid, pid, aname, aage, agender, aphone, adistrict, ajob) VALUES (#{oid}, #{nid}, #{pid}, #{aname}, #{aage}, #{agender}, #{aphone}, #{adistrict}, #{ajob});
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, p.pname FROM adoption a INNER JOIN protection p ON(a.pid = p.pid) ORDER BY a.aid DESC;
